meanings.definition: Placed or laid over something else
meanings.sent1: The superposed blanket kept me warm during the cold night.
meanings.sent2: The superposed layers of paint created a unique texture on the canvas.
meanings.sent3: The superposed cushions on the couch made it look like a cozy nest.
meanings.sent4: The superposed flavors in the dish danced on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The superposed leaves on the ground formed a colorful carpet in the park.

meanings.sent1: The superposed colors in the painting gave it a vibrant look.
meanings.sent2: The superposed scents of flowers filled the room with a pleasant aroma.
meanings.sent3: The superposed ingredients in the soup made it taste like a delicious mix.
meanings.sent4: The superposed voices in the choir created a harmonious melody.
meanings.sent5: The superposed patterns on the fabric made it visually appealing.

meanings.definition: Overlapped or stacked on top of each other
meanings.sent1: The superposed books on the shelf made it look cluttered.
meanings.sent2: The superposed bricks in the wall provided extra strength.
meanings.sent3: The superposed clouds in the sky resembled fluffy cotton balls.
meanings.sent4: The superposed waves in the ocean crashed against the shore.
meanings.sent5: The superposed layers of clothing kept me warm in the winter.
